approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

transfer.description: Transfers tokens directly from the caller’s address to another address.

transferFrom.description: Transfers tokens from one address to another on behalf of the sender.

constructor.description: Initializes the contract with the given initial values.

allowance.description: Returns the remaining number of tokens that a spender is allowed to withdraw.

approve.description: Allows a spender to withdraw from the caller’s account up to the amount specified.

balanceOf.description: Returns the token balance of a given address.

burn.description: Burns a specified amount of tokens.

decimals.description: Returns the number of decimal places for the token.

mint.description: Mints a specified amount of tokens.

name.description: Returns the name of the token.

owner.description: Returns the address of the contract owner.

setDecimals.description: Sets a new number of decimal places for the token.

setName.description: Sets a new name for the token.

setSymbol.description: Sets a new symbol for the token.

symbol.description: Returns the symbol of the token.

totalSupply.description: Returns the total supply of tokens.

transferOwnership.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new address.

Approval.description: Emitted when an approval is made for a spender.

OwnershipTransferred.description: Emitted when ownership is transferred to a new address.

SetDecimals.description: Emitted when the decimals of the token are set.

SetName.description: Emitted when the name of the token is set.

SetSymbol.description: Emitted when the symbol of the token is set.
